column1: Visualization in weighting T2 of the MRI size (256, 128, 1), showing the head of a man of 37 years old of axial section. Slice n°150 is observed from the base of the skull. We observe the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 4011.7676 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 3901.0254 mm³, the left lateral ventricle of volume 216.2109 mm³, the left caudate nucleus of volume 92.2852 mm³, the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 3978.8086 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 3898.3887 mm³, the right lateral ventricle of volume 218.8477 mm³ and the right caudate nucleus of volume 122.6074 mm³ there.
